attributes.action: Vote of No Confidence against Boris Johnson: failure to act against Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: The government's response to the Coronavirus crisis is reckless and irresponsible, against the advice of the WHO and clearly contrary to the action being taken world wide to mitigate the spread of the virus and the overwhelming of the health services. This government, and especially this man, is not fit to lead the country in such a dangerous time of crisis.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
